response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $14,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its market value and my cost, aiming to provide a fair deal for both parties while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the potential to strengthen our business relationship through this transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
